name: Jonatas de Moraes Junior
title: Senior Fullstack Software Engineer
profile: With about 17 years of experience in IT, I consider myself a very versatile professional capable of performing at every step of the development proccess - from requirements through development and delivery - always following the precepts of the Agile methodology. My main focuses are product quality, code simplicity and performance.

experiences.title: Systems Architect / Tech Lead
experiences.description: Design and development of several systems for different customers, involving Web and Mobile applications and Cloud environments. Creation of CI/CD pipelines for most of them, and automation of development environments in oder to speed up onboarding proccesses. Responsible also for recruitment and mentoring of newcomers.

experiences.title: Software Engineer - Backend
experiences.description: Maintenance on Recurring Payments and Payment Links web apps and APIs. Creation of API documentation for third-party customers.

experiences.title: Software Engineer / Tech Lead
experiences.description: Development and customization of e-commerce sites with Oracle Commerce Platform (ATG). Team Leader with responsibility over code quality and deliveries.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Development of an application for control of power lines and power supply commercialization contracts.

experiences.title: Software Engineer

experiences.title: Trainee / Software Engineer
